attributes.review: I so deeply wanted to enjoy this app. First thing when I opened the app, I  was immediately& physically teleported to the White House. I saw first hand what actually goes on behind the scenes. I saw Trump shaking hands with Bob the Builder. I tried to run away from this horrific sight but Bob was faster than me. Bob the Builder then force fed me black licorice and cheese whiz even tho Iâ€™m vegan :(. Donald Trump then began to sing the national anthem, but in cursive. My ears were physically bleeding. I prayed to my true lord and savior, Francine Frensky from Arthur, to show me a sign. Before I knew it, I was teleported back to now. I deleted the app and never looked back.
attributes.title: Stanky Musty Crusty & Dusty
